capabilities.name: HUBSPOT_LIST_TICKETS
capabilities.description: Retrieves a paginated list of HubSpot tickets.

capabilities.name: HUBSPOT_MERGE_CONTACTS
capabilities.description: Merges two HubSpot contacts into one.

capabilities.name: HUBSPOT_MERGE_DEALS
capabilities.description: Merges two HubSpot deals into one.

capabilities.name: HUBSPOT_MERGE_EMAILS
capabilities.description: Merges two HubSpot emails into one.

capabilities.name: HUBSPOT_MERGE_PRODUCTS
capabilities.description: Merges two HubSpot products into one.

capabilities.name: HUBSPOT_MERGE_TICKETS
capabilities.description: Merges two HubSpot tickets into one.

capabilities.name: HUBSPOT_MERGE_TWO_COMPANIES_OF_SAME_TYPE
capabilities.description: Merges two existing company records of the same type in HubSpot CRM, where `objectIdToMerge` is absorbed into `primaryObjectId`; this operation is irreversible.

capabilities.name: HUBSPOT_MERGE_TWO_CONTACTS_OF_SAME_TYPE
capabilities.description: DEPRECATED: Please use 'MERGE_CONTACTS' instead.

capabilities.name: HUBSPOT_MERGE_TWO_DEALS_OF_SAME_TYPE
capabilities.description: DEPRECATED: Please use 'MERGE_DEALS' instead.

capabilities.name: HUBSPOT_MERGE_TWO_EMAILS_WITH_SAME_TYPE
capabilities.description: DEPRECATED: Please use 'MERGE_EMAILS' instead.

capabilities.name: HUBSPOT_MERGE_TWO_FEEDBACK_SUBMISSIONS
capabilities.description: Merges two existing feedback submissions by ID, primarily for consolidating duplicates or related feedback; this operation is irreversible, and `primaryObjectId` values take precedence in conflicts.

capabilities.name: HUBSPOT_MERGE_TWO_LINE_ITEMS_OF_SAME_TYPE
capabilities.description: Merges two line items, `objectIdToMerge` into `primaryObjectId`, which must be of the same type; `objectIdToMerge` is absorbed and the operation is irreversible.

capabilities.name: HUBSPOT_MERGE_TWO_OBJECTS_OF_SAME_TYPE
capabilities.description: Merges two distinct HubSpot CRM objects of the same `objectType`, consolidating data into `primaryObjectId` (which is preserved) and deleting `objectIdToMerge`; this operation is permanent and irreversible.

capabilities.name: HUBSPOT_MERGE_TWO_PRODUCTS_OF_THE_SAME_TYPE
capabilities.description: DEPRECATED: Please use 'MERGE_PRODUCTS' instead.

capabilities.name: HUBSPOT_MERGE_TWO_QUOTES_OF_SAME_TYPE
capabilities.description: Merges two distinct quotes of the same type by consolidating `objectIdToMerge` into `primaryObjectId` (e.g., for combining information or updating terms); this operation is irreversible.

capabilities.name: HUBSPOT_MERGE_TWO_TICKETS_OF_SAME_TYPE
capabilities.description: DEPRECATED: Please use 'MERGE_TICKETS' instead.

capabilities.name: HUBSPOT_MODIFY_CALLING_EXTENSION_SETTINGS
capabilities.description: Updates settings (e.g., display name, UI URL/dimensions, feature flags) for an existing calling extension app, identified by `appId`.

capabilities.name: HUBSPOT_PARTIALLY_UPDATE_CONTACT_USING_CONTACT_ID
capabilities.description: DEPRECATED: Please use 'UPDATE_CONTACT' instead.

capabilities.name: HUBSPOT_PARTIALLY_UPDATE_CRM_OBJECT_BY_ID
capabilities.description: Partially updates specified properties of a CRM object (e.g., contact, company, deal) identified by its type and ID, or optionally by a unique property value if `idProperty` is specified.

capabilities.name: HUBSPOT_PARTIALLY_UPDATE_DEAL_BY_ID
capabilities.description: DEPRECATED: Please use 'UPDATE_DEAL' instead.

capabilities.name: HUBSPOT_PARTIALLY_UPDATE_PIPELINE_BY_ID
capabilities.description: Partially updates a CRM pipeline's label, display order, or restores an archived pipeline by setting `archived` to `false`.

capabilities.name: HUBSPOT_PARTIALLY_UPDATE_PROPERTY_GROUP
capabilities.description: Partially updates a property group's `displayOrder` or `label` for a specified CRM `objectType` in HubSpot.

capabilities.name: HUBSPOT_PARTIALLY_UPDATE_TICKET_BY_ID
capabilities.description: DEPRECATED: Please use 'UPDATE_TICKET' instead.

capabilities.name: HUBSPOT_PARTIAL_UPDATE_COMPANY_OBJECT_BY_ID
capabilities.description: DEPRECATED: Please use 'UPDATE_COMPANY' instead.

capabilities.name: HUBSPOT_PARTIAL_UPDATE_QUOTE_BY_QUOTE_ID
capabilities.description: Performs a partial update on an existing HubSpot quote's specified properties, identifying the quote by `quoteId` (either its internal ID or a custom unique property value if `idProperty` is provided).

capabilities.name: HUBSPOT_PERMANENTLY_DELETE_COMPANY_FOR_GDPR_COMPLIANCE
capabilities.description: Permanently deletes a company (identified by objectId) and its associated data from HubSpot for GDPR compliance; this action is irreversible and requires the company to exist.

capabilities.name: HUBSPOT_PERMANENTLY_DELETE_CONTACT_FOR_GDPR
capabilities.description: Irreversibly deletes a HubSpot contact for GDPR; if deleting by a non-existent email (using idProperty 'email'), the email is blocklisted instead.

capabilities.name: HUBSPOT_PERMANENTLY_DELETE_CONTACT_FOR_GDPR_COMPLIANCE
capabilities.description: Irreversibly erases a HubSpot contact and associated data per a GDPR request; if an email is given for a non-existent contact, it's blocklisted.

capabilities.name: HUBSPOT_PERMANENTLY_DELETE_CONTACT_GDPR_COMPLIANCE
capabilities.description: Permanently and irreversibly deletes a HubSpot **quote** (not a contact, despite the action's internal naming) to comply with GDPR's 'right to be forgotten'.

capabilities.name: HUBSPOT_PERMANENTLY_DELETE_CONTACT_VIA_GDPR
capabilities.description: Permanently deletes a HubSpot contact and all its associated data for GDPR compliance, identifying the contact by its ID or another unique property.

capabilities.name: HUBSPOT_PERMANENTLY_DELETE_DEAL_FOR_GDPR_COMPLIANCE
capabilities.description: Permanently deletes a HubSpot deal for GDPR compliance, identified by its unique ID or a specified property value; this action is irreversible and may blocklist the identifier if the deal isn't found when using `idProperty`.

capabilities.name: HUBSPOT_PERMANENTLY_DELETE_GDPR_CONTACT_AND_CONTENT
capabilities.description: Permanently and irreversibly deletes an existing HubSpot contact and associated content for GDPR compliance, optionally blocklisting the contact's email.

capabilities.name: HUBSPOT_PERMANENTLY_DELETE_LINE_ITEMS_FOR_GDPR
capabilities.description: Permanently deletes a specified line item and its associated content for GDPR compliance; this action is irreversible and cannot be undone.

capabilities.name: HUBSPOT_PUBLISH_MARKETING_EMAIL
capabilities.description: Publishes or sends a specified HubSpot marketing email that is valid and ready for sending; requires Marketing Hub Enterprise or the transactional email add-on.

capabilities.name: HUBSPOT_PURGE_SCHEMA_BY_OBJECT_TYPE
capabilities.description: Permanently and irreversibly deletes the schema for an existing `objectType` in HubSpot CRM; this deprecated endpoint should be used with extreme caution.

capabilities.name: HUBSPOT_READ
capabilities.description: Call this to retrieve an existing HubSpot email by its `emailId` or an alternative unique `idProperty`.

capabilities.name: HUBSPOT_READ_A_BATCH_OF_CAMPAIGNS
capabilities.description: DEPRECATED: Please use 'GET_CAMPAIGNS' instead.

capabilities.name: HUBSPOT_READ_A_BATCH_OF_CRM_OBJECT_PROPERTIES
capabilities.description: Reads definitions (metadata, not values) for a batch of CRM object properties for a specified `objectType`, supporting partial success.

capabilities.name: HUBSPOT_READ_A_CAMPAIGN
capabilities.description: DEPRECATED: Please use 'GET_CAMPAIGN' instead.

capabilities.name: HUBSPOT_READ_A_CRM_PROPERTY_BY_NAME
capabilities.description: Reads a specific CRM property definition for a given HubSpot object type by its internal name.

capabilities.name: HUBSPOT_READ_ALL_PROPERTIES_FOR_OBJECT_TYPE
capabilities.description: Retrieves definitions and metadata (not actual values) for properties of a specified HubSpot CRM object type (e.g., 'contacts', 'companies', 'deals', or custom objects).

capabilities.name: HUBSPOT_READ_A_PAGE_OF_DEALS
capabilities.description: DEPRECATED: Please use 'LIST_DEALS' instead.

capabilities.name: HUBSPOT_READ_APAGE_OF_OBJECTS_BY_TYPE
capabilities.description: Retrieves a paginated list of objects for a specified and valid HubSpot CRM object type (e.g., 'contacts', 'companies', 'deals', or custom ID).

capabilities.name: HUBSPOT_READ_A_PROPERTY_GROUP
capabilities.description: Retrieves metadata for a specific property group of a given CRM object type, detailing its structure and attributes, but not the actual property values of CRM objects.

capabilities.name: HUBSPOT_READ_BATCH_FEEDBACK_SUBMISSIONS_BY_ID_OR_PROPERTY
capabilities.description: Retrieves up to 100 feedback submissions in a batch using their IDs or a specified unique `idProperty`, optionally including specified properties and their history.

capabilities.name: HUBSPOT_READ_BATCH_OF_CONTACTS_BY_ID_OR_PROPERTIES
capabilities.description: DEPRECATED: Please use 'GET_CONTACTS' instead.
